m_szDocTitle: Less Than 2% Of Uber's Revenue Subject To US Taxes
m_szDocSumamry: May 10th, 2016 by Jo Borrás   Originally published on Gas2 . Despite not showing big profits yet, Uber is making moves to ensure that it pays next to nothing in taxes if and when it finally does become profitable. It was recently reported that Uber, in a presentation made to investors last fall, had assigned its IP to Bermuda.
